message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm and the value you see in it. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $1200000 for this product. Would it be possible for you to adjust your offer accordingly?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1400000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $1350000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $1380000. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to accepting the offer from John, who is willing to pay the full $1200000.

I've carefully considered your last offer, Alice. I'm willing to move forward with an offer of $1365000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you and we can finalize the transaction.
